item.title: Things I wish I learnt before getting a job
item.description: Disclaimer: there is only so much you can prepare in advance. You’ll mostly learn everything on the job itself but I think there are some learnings which can take off the load. Instead of trying to play catch up while on the job. Most of the big tech companies have in-house tooling which is a beast in itself to learn (depending on the company and how much internal tools they own).
